title: London Bridge Is Falling Down
short_plot_summary: The classic nursery rhyme 'London Bridge Is Falling Down' tells the story of the gradual collapse of London Bridge and various attempts to repair it.
explanation: The United Kingdom flag, representing the origin of the song and its subject, London Bridge
A bridge, representing the actual London Bridge which the song is about
A face with wide-open mouth and raised eyebrows, displaying the fear and shock of London Bridge falling down
A wrench, symbolizing the numerous attempts to repair and rebuild the bridge
A counterclockwise arrow, illustrating the repetitive nature of the song and its cycles of the bridge's fall and repair attempts
